roleset.name: work, being employed, acts, deeds (no physical parts or gov't departments!)

example.name: work-v: unaccusative
example.text: US trade law is working.

example.name: work-v: unaccusative with more details
example.text: Ms. Kirkpatrick worked in Tokyo for three years.

example.name: work-v: job
example.text: Mr. Cray has been working on the project for more than six years.

example.name: work-v: odd job variant
example.text: 33 men worked closely with the substance.

example.name: work-v: employer and job
example.text: Mr. Cray will work for the Colorado Springs CO company as an independent contractor.
example.arg: for the Colorado Springs CO company

example.name: work-v: with coworker, predicative job
example.text: He will work with his successor to ensure a smooth transition.

example.name: work-v: cause, create
example.text: In addition to his interest in ozone depletion he has extensively studied the related topic of global warming, a theory that mankind's generation of carbon dioxide through increased combustion of fossil fuels is creating a ``greenhouse effect'' that [] will work important climatic changes in the earth's atmosphere over time.

example.name: work-n: args 0, 1 and 3
example.text: its subcontract work with prime contractor McDonnell Douglas Corp
example.arg: with prime contractor McDonnell Douglas Corp

example.name: work-n: Example with arg 1 and 2
example.text: Computer Sciences will perform data processing work for thePostal Service under the three-year contract , which alsoincludes two additional option years for which compensation hasn't yet been fixed .

example.name: work-n: Example with arg 0 and the relativly rare arg 2
example.text: where-1 we do all our work with the government *-1

example.name: work-n: Arg 0 following the noun
example.text: the work of people in those countries

example.name: work-n: Arg 1 as a project
example.text: The work to recover bodies from the sunken nuclear submarine Kursk
example.arg: to recover bodies from the sunken nuclear submarine Kursk

example.name: work-n: Medical arg 1
example.text: blood work

example.name: work-n: Medical arg 0 - lab is processing
example.text: Will obtain chest x-ray, lab work, and ECG

example.name: working-n: args 0 and 1
example.text: his working on the concerto was largely responsible for his failing to complete Lulu before his death on December 24, 1935.

example.name: working-n: man-thieves and roasted pigeons. Args 0 and PRP
example.text: Besides I say that those who suffer themselves to be persuaded and enticed away by the man-thieves, are very foolish if they believe that roasted pigeons will fly into their mouths in America or Pennsylvania without their working for them.

example.name: works-n: args 0, 1, LOC
example.text: At the same time , new high level zones of Changchun , Suzhou , Shenyang , Changsha , Shijiazhuang , Kunming , etc. have either successively completed the State Council legislative works of new high level zones or issued management methods of new high level zones in the form of government orders .

example.name: works-n: deeds, LVC
example.text: China's Red Cross has done lots of good works for the people

example.name: works-n: with arg2
example.text: Zemin Jiang said , the China 's Red Cross is an international social aid organization engaged in humanitarian works , and for the past ninety years has done lots of good works for the people and made a lot of contributions to the development of the country , in accordance to the basic principles of the Red Cross and Red Crescent movement .

example.name: NOT EVENTIVE! .YY!
example.text: Other works are usually added to the enceinte to strengthen the weak points of the fortification, or to lengthen the siege by forcing the enemy to gain possession of them before he can breach the body of the place:

example.name: NOT EVENTIVE! Call it .YY!!!
example.text: Ou is Macau 's secretary for transportation and public works , and has been appointed by Chief Executive Edmund Ho as one of the SAR government 's five administration secretaries .

roleset.note: WORK-V NOTES: Member of Vncls cooperate-73-3. (from work.01-v)
WORK-N NOTES: Roleset based on work01. No corresponding vn class. Framed by Katie (from work.01-n)
WORKING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on work-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls cooperate-73-3. (from working.01-n)
WORKS-N NOTES: Added due to expansion of Nombank. No FN class. Framed by Katie, clarified for unification by Julia. (from works.01-n)

roleset.name: move with purpose

example.name: work-v: missing desctination
example.text: The curator, 27-year-old Sherman Krisher of Greenwich, Conn., had worked his way up from janitor in seven years at the museum.
example.arg: The curator, 27-year-old Sherman Krisher of Greenwich, Conn.,
in seven years at the museum.

example.name: work-v: Metaphorical
example.text: The patient worked up to 2000mg from 1000mg of her medication a day.
example.arg: from 1000mg of her medication a day.

example.name: working-n: args 0, 1, 4 and TMP
example.text: The next section of the book describes their working their way over to the other side of the island of Navarone, while dodging German patrols, and nursing their wounded comrade.
example.arg: over to the other side of the island of Navarone,
while dodging German patrols, and nursing their wounded comrade.

roleset.note: WORK-V NOTES: (from work.06-v)
WORKING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on work-v.06. (from working.06-n)

roleset.name: put, manipulate, inserting

example.name: work-v: filthy capitalism
example.text: And by basing donations on BK Doubles, a new double-hamburger line the fast-food chain is trying to push, Burger King works a sales pitch into its public-service message.
example.arg: by basing donations on BK Doubles, a new double-hamburger line the fast-food chain is trying to push,

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: She working it .

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: And by basing donations on BK Doubles , a new double - hamburger line the fast - food chain is trying to push , Burger King works a sales pitch into its public - service message .
example.arg: by basing donations on BK Doubles , a new double - hamburger line the fast - food chain is trying to push

example.name: working-n: just arg1
example.text: Since I like wood working I thought some folks would enjoy an amplifier shell that they could finish themselves and either use it to restore an old Marshall amplifier or to collect aftermarket parts from countless other vendors and end up with a Vintage Marshall clone .

roleset.note: WORK-V NOTES: Member of Vncls knead-26.5. Updated by Julia. (from work.07-v)
WORKING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, work-v.07. Corresponds to VNcls knead-26.5. (from working.07-n)

roleset.name: wreak, bring about (past tense wrought)

example.name: work-v: wrought
example.text: It may seem trivial to worry about the World Series amid [the destruction to the Bay Area]-1 wrought [*]-1 by Tuesday's quake, but the name of this column is ``On Sports,'' so I feel obliged to do so.

roleset.note: WORK-V NOTES: 'wrought' is a perfectly legitimate past tense and past participle of work-- not a mistaken etymology like this roleset previously stated.

roleset.name: function, operate

example.name: work-v: worker
example.text: 5. Differentiation is good and works to your advantage.

example.name: work-v: job
example.text: ON programming is simply [the way] [*0*]-9 Taiwan television works [*T*]-9.

roleset.note: WORK-V NOTES: Frame added by Arrick (from work.09-v)

roleset.name: resultative construction

role.descr: Thing undergoing change of state, unselected object of work
End result of thing worked, arg1

example.name: work-v: All args
example.text: PRO sum up why you re there and work your bottom off to get the best grades you can.
example.arg: to get the best grades you can.

roleset.note: WORK-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT phase 1 task 2. Framed by Claire. (from work.10-v)
The arg1 is an unselected object in that it's not actually an argument of "work", see example: the bottom isn't actually worked, it's state is changed via working. (from work.10-v)

roleset.name: 'in the works'

example.name: work-n: Example with arg 1
example.text: at long last, changes may be in the works

example.name: work-n: Another example with Arg 1
example.text: There aren't any other deals in the works

example.name: work-n: Example with rel only, where it may be tempting to mark arg 1
example.text: Another CIA leak probe may be in the works.

roleset.note: WORK-N NOTES: Roleset based on some relation to work.04. No corresponding VN class. Framed by Katie (from work.02-n)

roleset.name: work-of-art

example.name: work-n: arg 1 as a subject area
example.text: he modeled his work on Western classics

example.name: work-n: example with arg 0
example.text: her gridded two-dimensional works

example.name: work-n: Another arg 0 example
example.text: A documentary on the work of painter Leon Engelen

example.name: work-n: Example with all args
example.text: Leonardo Da Vinci's work, the Mona Lisa

roleset.note: WORK-N NOTES: No corresponding VN class. Framed by Katie (from work.03-n)

roleset.name: 'at-work' cause change, at/in play

example.name: work-n: Example with arg 1
example.text: The forces at work

example.name: work-n: Another arg 1 example
example.text: There 's a certain cruel logic at work here

example.name: work-n: Slightly different arg 1 with loc
example.text: We've got a very strong military force and deterrent force at work in Asia
example.arg: a very strong military force and deterrent force

roleset.note: WORK-N NOTES: Roleset based on exist.01. Verbnet class gorge 39.6. Framed by Katie (from work.04-n)

roleset.name: work out: arrange

example.name: work_out-v: scheme
example.text: The company will work out a plan to pay its debts.
example.arg: a plan to pay its debts.

example.name: work_out-v: collaborators
example.text: The details haven't been worked out between the Seattle aerospace company and Kawasaki Heavy Industries, Ltd.
example.arg: between the Seattle aerospace company and Kawasaki Heavy Industries, Ltd.

example.name: work_out-v: nicely unaccusative
example.text: ``Things work out unexpectedly in life,'' said Ms. Volokh.

roleset.note: WORK_OUT-V NOTES: (from work.02-v)

roleset.name: work out: exercise

example.name: ARG0
example.text: To combine this with working out is to combine a beauty perspective with a health one , with more of a recreational feel . "

roleset.note: WORK_OUT-V NOTES: (from work.03-v)
WORKING_OUT-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparison to exercise.02. Exercise.02 is a member of VN class dress-41.1.1. Framed by Katie. (from working.08-n)

roleset.name: work out: amount, count up

example.name: work_out-v: work it out
example.text: But Mr. Achenbaum pioneered negotiated fees, which *trace* often worked out to less than 15%.

example.name: work_out-v: with agent
example.text: (No one has worked out the players' average age, but most appear to be in their late 30s.)

roleset.note: WORK_OUT-V NOTES: (from work.05-v)

roleset.name: work up: create, cause to come about

example.name: work_up-v: back to exercise
example.text: They have worked up a sweat.

example.name: work_up-v: with benefactive
example.text: The decision in Los Angeles federal court stems from a 1985 Mercury Sable TV ad that Young& Rubicam worked *trace* up for Ford Motor Co.

roleset.note: WORK_UP-V NOTES: (from work.04-v)

roleset.name: determine and perform necessary medical course of action

example.name: work_up-v: Arg1 and Arg1
example.text: [How]-1 do you work up a kid with hematuria ?

example.name: work_up-v: Arg0 and Arg2
example.text: [How]-1 should you work up the incidental finding of a rare metamyelocyte on a peripheral blood smear from a child ?
example.arg: the incidental finding of a rare metamyelocyte on a peripheral blood smear from a child

example.name: work_up-v: All args
example.text: [How]-1 do you work up microscopic hematuria in an adult ?

roleset.note: WORK_UP-V NOTES: Based on medical QA corpus; same as workup.101 (Framed by Anwen 07/17/10) (from work.101-v)

WORK_UP-V NOTES: (from workup.101-v)

roleset.name: Angry, agitated, excited about something

example.name: Typical usage, with 'becoming' support verb
example.text: He's getting all worked up over nothing.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in CTS02. Framed by Claire
